A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie threw away so many legacy characters. The build up of seeing the characters I loved enjoyed as a kid get was great\, and I feel this movie just looked over the fact that people wanted to see these legacy characters interact and do something. Luke did a little something at the end....it was awful..I really didn't like this movie...if they were going to kill off all the characters of the old movies.. they should have made a new star wars movie that had nothing to do with the originals.
